Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
This is an array-based container class with an initial capacity of 5.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Account[] accounts  
    private int size  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    AccountDatabase()
    Default Account Database size of 5

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean add​(Account account)
    Adds an account to the accounts array if it does not already exist.
    boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
    Depostis money to an account within the account database
    private int find​(Account account)
    Finds an account within the account database
    private void grow()
    Increases database size by 5
    void printAccounts()
    Print all accounts
    void printByDateOpen()
    Print all accounts within the database in ascending order by date opened
    void printByLastName()
    Print all accounts within the database in ascending order by last name
    boolean remove​(Account account)
    Removes an account from the account database
    private void sortByDateOpen()
    Uses Bubble Sort to sort all accounts in Account Database in Ascending Order by date
    private void sortByLastName()
    Uses Bubble Sort to sort all accounts in Account Database in Ascending Order by Last Name
    int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
    Withdraws money from an account within the account database

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find​(Account account)
      Finds an account within the account database
      Parameters:
      account - to be found
      Returns:
      index of account, -1 if account not found

    • grow

      private void grow()
      Increases database size by 5

    • add

      public boolean add​(Account account)
      Adds an account to the accounts array if it does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      account - to be added
      Returns:
      False if the account already exists in the array. True if it does not.gi

    • remove

      public boolean remove​(Account account)
      Removes an account from the account database
      Parameters:
      account - to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if account removed, false otherwise

    • deposit

      public boolean deposit​(Account account, double amount)
      Depostis money to an account within the account database
      Parameters:
      account - to deposit too
      amount - to be depsoited
      Returns:
      true if account exists and amount is deposited, false is the account does not exist

    • withdrawal

      public int withdrawal​(Account account, double amount)
      Withdraws money from an account within the account database
      Parameters:
      account - to withdraw from
      amount - to be withdrawn
      Returns:
      0 if withdrawal is successful, 1 if there are insufficient funds, and -1 if account doesn’t exist

    • sortByDateOpen

      private void sortByDateOpen()
      Uses Bubble Sort to sort all accounts in Account Database in Ascending Order by date

    • sortByLastName

      private void sortByLastName()
      Uses Bubble Sort to sort all accounts in Account Database in Ascending Order by Last Name

    • printByDateOpen

      public void printByDateOpen()
      Print all accounts within the database in ascending order by date opened

    • printByLastName

      public void printByLastName()
      Print all accounts within the database in ascending order by last name

    • printAccounts

      public void printAccounts()
      Print all accounts
